song_name: Don't Fall Asleep At The Helm
lyrics:
14 contributorsdonâ€™t fall asleep at the helm lyricsverse 1
i lost my heart my home is the ocean
the waves underneath will soon be my home
i will fall asleep ill close my eyes and
dream of days when i wasnt all alone

chorus
all that i know is gone take what is left of me now

ill miss my breath theres no more left
ill miss the sound of the wind at my back
the depths have a number they call you by name
fall asleep davy jones calls you
so fall asleep fall asleep and dream
